issue.title: [Python] Do not use symlinks in python/cmake_modules
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-1617](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-1617). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
This requires that `git config core.symlinks true` be set, which makes development and source releases (on Linux/macOS even) more brittle

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-1617?focusedCommentId=16196270) by Wes McKinney (wesm):*
I'm half-handling this as part of ARROW-1535, which makes things work on Windows even without `core.symlinks` being set
